metadata.title: CVE-2013-4260 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
lib/ansible/playbook/__init__.py in Ansible 1.2.x before 1.2.3, whenplaybook does not run due to an error, allows local users to overwritearbitrary files via a symlink attack on a retry file with a predictablename in /var/tmp/ansible/.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-4260` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ansible - 1.5.4+dfsg-1
ansible-fireball - 1.5.4+dfsg-1
ansible-node-fireball - 1.5.4+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ansible package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.4+dfsg-1').
